item.title: Air France enhances first class experience with new La Première cabins
item.description:
Air France launched its new La Première cabin on January 12th, debuting on flight AF254 traveling from Paris-Charles de Gaulle to Singapore and Jakarta. This move emphasizes the airline’s commitment to providing top-tier products and services to its Southeast Asian clientele. Starting in February 2015 and continuing through the winter season, these new cabins will be offered on all daily flights to Singapore and Jakarta. Source: Air France website. Frédéric Gagey, Air France’s Chairman and CEO, stated: “Our objective with the new La Première suites is to offer the absolute best in the market, and that’s what we’re showcasing today...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/air-france-enhances-first-class-experience-with-new-la-premi-re-cabins/
